title: Importing MBOX to Thunderbird for Android
creator: niktizek
content:
I looked up how to import from Gmail into Thunderbird but, after doing an export from Gmail to MBOX, realised the instructions appear to be for Thunderbird for desktop.

I'm using POP/SMTP.

So I have my email sitting in an MBOX file on my phone, but I can't find any instructions on how to import the email to Thunderbird for Android.

I moved to Thunderbird for Android, away from K9mail, because K9 wouldn't seem to download all my messages. Worked fine for a while, then just started downloading one email per fetch even though there were hundreds yet more to download.

I read about the import feature for Thunderbird and so installed onto both PC and mobile phone. Now I can't see how to get the mail onto the phone.

I've been searching for more than 24 hours now for a solution. It probably doesn't help that a search for Thunderbird for Android still brings up solutions for Thunderbird for desktop.

Can anyone here assist?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:128.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/128.0;os:Android and Windows 10

title: Broken search on Android?
creator: elmerbug
content: Search stopped working on my Windows 11 and Android platforms. I deleted the global database and restarted Thunderbird on Windows 11. Problem solved. Unfortunately, on Android, no joy.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Thunderbird on Android closes when rotating phone
creator: al45
content: I'm using 11.0b3 on android v11. Just starting with this release, when I rotate my phone from portrait to landscape Thunderbird closes

title: Thunderbird on Android - "Download complete message" button is hidden by the navigation buttons
creator: al45
content:
Running 11.0b3 on Android 11.

When I open a message I am no longer able to click at the bottom of the message to "Download complete message". This has been happening for a couple of beta releases now. I guess that this is only a problem when using the navigation buttons but although I use gestures on my tablet, I don't like them on my phone.

Thanks

title: Add Gmail account, how?
creator: pg.zapata
content: I can't add my gmail account. Android and Windows 11

title: Filter Settings in Thunderbird for Android
creator: lasse
content: Where can I find the settings for filters in Thunderbird for Android? I could import all my accounts with many folders from my desktop, but the filters do not work on my smartphone the way they work on my desktop.
